about_the_game:
VIRTUAnimator is a simple, easy-to-use animation tool, made for VR.

Load a scene, spawn some objects, then pose them - create keyframes, and watch it animate between each pose automatically. You can even render out your animation as an image sequence (and an MP4 file soon)!

If you're not too great at animation, you can still pose objects, characters, add particles and lights, and more, and render out cool stills or backgrounds!

With Steam Workshop support, you can even add your own content, whether that be weapons, props, characters, or even entire scenes!

With the addition of Live Recording, Pose Blending, and Collada DAE export, you can even use it as a quick-pose tool for your favorite 3D software!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 970, AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better
  • VR Support: SteamVR. Standing or Room Scale
  • Additional Notes: A VR-Ready rig is minimum recommended. You might be able to go lower, but you'll probably lose frames.

short_description: VIRUTAnimator is a fun and easy animation tool for VR. It allows anyone to easily create animated scenes by simply moving objects in virtual space with supported motion controllers. Share your animations, or get more objects to work with from the Steam Workshop!
